title: Over 20,000 attended two day Property Show
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 12 (APP):A record breaking 20,000 people attended the two-day property show organized by Zameen.com, Pakistan’s largest real estate enterprise in Dubai.
Over 60 exhibitors showcased more than 200 of the best and most trustworthy major property developments in Pakistan as Zameen.com brings together Pakistani real estate players at Pakistan Property Show in Dubai
The annual event targets around 4 million overseas Pakistanis in the Gulf region and those interested in real estate projects across Pakistan’s the major cities.
Huge crowds gathered at the fourth edition of the Pakistan Property Show over the weekend at the World Trade Centre in Dubai to explore major investment opportunities in the Pakistan property market.
Important dignitaries graced the event, including Director General of the Dubai Land Department Sultan Butti Bin Mejren, and prominent journalists from Pakistan. Zameen.com’s Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Zeeshan Ali Khan, Country Head Ahmed Bhatti, EMPG and members of Zameen’s senior management.
During the event, Director General of the Dubai Land Department Sultan Butti Bin Mejren stated that it was a great honour to inaugurate the Pakistan Property Show.
Dubai is proud of its cultural and religious diversity, particularly the large community of Pakistani expats that have helped the emirate become a hub for business, real estate development, and tourism. Zameen.com is a pioneer in organizing such interactive events in the Gulf region, he expressed.
Commenting on the huge success of the Property Show, Zeeshan Ali Khan, CEO of Zameen.com said that the Pakistan Property Show in Dubai was a huge success once again. Over 20,000 attendees demonstrate strong interest in finding the right investment opportunity in Pakistan’s property market.
In Dubai, we have brought over 60 exhibitors offering the cream of investment opportunities available on the very ripe Pakistani real estate market at the moment, he added.
During the two-day event, an important panel session was held which was moderated by popular TV anchors Syed Shafaat Ali and Shiffa Yousafzai. Panelists discussed ‘Why real estate continues to be the best investment in Pakistan,’ providing attendees and online viewers with invaluable insights into the current state of the property sector and its future prospects. Speaking on the panel were prominent media personalities, Waseem Badami, Muhammad Maalik and Zameen.com’s CEO, Zeeshan Ali Khan.
Chief Executive Officer Makeen Marketing Pvt Ltd Hassan Talal along with team participated in the event. The Makeen Marketing also placed a stall at the event.
Speaking on the occasion, Talal lauded the holding of such exhibitions and asked overseas Pakistanis to invest in the real estate as it was the safest way to save their money.
